title: New: Sleep ∞ Over – Romantic Streams (CFCF remix)
content: Montreal’s CFCF reworking of last years wonder track, Romantic Streams, has made me re-visit one of my favorite albums of last year, so it can only be a good thing. It also happens to be a fantastic, hollowed out, yet flush and reverberating reinterpretation of the ‘classic’.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
